full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` BYANG SHAMBHA LAR 'PHO BA SKAL LDAN MYUR 'DREN PHYOGS MTHUN SMON LAM DRI MED BCAS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES BYANG SHAMBHA LAR 'PHO BA'I MAN NGAG SKAL LDAN MYUR 'DREN ZHES BYA BYA BA 'DI NI SEMS DPA' SPRUL SKU DANG, RTZA CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA RNAMS LAS DUS 'KHOR GYI RNAMS SPRUL SKU BTAN CING, RANG NYID LA'ANG DANG LDAN RNAMS SHAMBHA LAR 'KHRID NUS PA'I SNANG BCUNG ZANG YOD PA, SHI RAL THU MKHAS BTZUN BLO GROS BZANG PO'I 'PHRAL DU SBYAR BA'O, ,)
